professional_summary: Enthusiastic IT Professional with Overall 7+ years of IT Industry Experience and 3+ years as a Scrum Master. Expertise in Agile/Scrum methodologies, coaching, mentoring, and project management.

key_responsibilities: Leading Agile/Scrum practices within the organization.
Coaching teams to enhance collaboration and productivity.
Ensuring effective use of Scrum tools and techniques.
Implementing Scrum methodologies to streamline operations.
Providing training and mentorship to team members.
Optimizing workflows using Jira and Rally.

Microsoft Office Suite",
            "Jira",
